 2007-14712007-10-04,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment made by the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada of MARK CARNEY, of Ottawa, Ontario, as Governor of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of seven years, effective February 1, 2008.
